summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Website Competitor Analyzer MVP. Backend APIs are 93.8% functional with core features working. Frontend UI/UX is solid but has authentication issues during analysis results display.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Request timeout when fetching analyses list
flaky_endpoints.impact: Users cannot view their analysis history

integration_issues.issue: Authentication token expires during analysis processing, redirecting users to login
Frontend may not properly handle token refresh during long polling

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication token management for long-running operations. The analysis results page redirects to login due to token expiration during analysis processing. Implement token refresh or extend token lifetime for analysis flows.
